message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'd be really interested in. I'm asking for $10000 for it, but I'm open to reasonable negotiation. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $7500 is lower than my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $8500. This would still allow me to cover my costs and make a fair profit.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $8500 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $7000?
